fields.title: Community Events Manager
fields.description: Lead the planning and execution of community-focused events and popups for Debaren. Bonus: Experience with co-working venues or event promotion.
fields.requirements:
• 3+ years in event management
  • Strong organizational skills
  • Passion for networking

fields.title: Venue Partnerships Specialist
fields.description:
Grow Debaren’s network of creative spaces, schools, and WiFi venues.
Excellent opportunity for relationship-builders.
fields.requirements:
• 1+ years sales/partnership experience
  • Outgoing personality
  • Fluency in English and/or Portuguese preferred

fields.title: Frontend React Developer
fields.description: Help us craft beautiful, modern UI for venue discovery and event management using Next.js and React.
fields.requirements:
• 2+ years experience with React/Next.js
  • Portfolio of web apps
  • Attention to detail

fields.title: Marketing & Content Coordinator
fields.description: Drive user engagement across social media, email, and web content. Help tell Debaren's story and build our community.
fields.requirements:
• 2+ years digital marketing
  • Experience with Instagram, TikTok, and newsletters
  • Excellent writing skills

fields.title: Operations Coordinator
fields.description: Coordinate venue onboarding, support logistics, and ensure top quality for all Debaren partners and clients.
fields.requirements:
• 2+ years in admin/operations
  • Strong communicator
  • Experience in events or hospitality a plus

fields.title: Education Partnerships Lead
fields.description: Develop relationships with schools and universities for creative space sharing, workshops, and events.
fields.requirements:
• Experience working with education sector
  • Strong networking skills
  • Proactive, self-driven

fields.title: Full Stack Developer
fields.description: Work with our tech team to build scalable APIs and web features for venue discovery and booking. Django and Next.js preferred.
fields.requirements:
• Python (Django) and React/Next.js experience
  • REST API and PostgreSQL skills
  • Strong collaboration

fields.cover_letter: I am passionate about community engagement and have managed several large events for local NGOs. Debaren’s vision excites me!
Tenho experiência em parcerias e vendas, com paixão por conectar espaços criativos a pessoas inovadoras.
As a React developer, I love building intuitive interfaces. I’m excited about Debaren’s mission and want to help you scale.
Digital storytelling and online communities are my passion. I’d love to help Debaren grow its digital footprint.
Trabalhei em operações e logística em empresas de eventos e posso ajudar a Debaren a garantir eficiência.
I have led educational partnerships and believe in the power of creative space sharing for learning.
My skills with Django and Next.js fit perfectly for your stack, and I’m passionate about building reliable, scalable tech.
